ST. LOUIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Aegion Corporation (Nasdaq Global Select Market: AEGN) has announced its       Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, David A. Martin,       will attend the GHS 1x1 Series Industrials Conference on September 3,       2015 in Chicago, Illinois.
Aegion’s President and Chief Executive Officer, Charles R. Gordon, will       attend the D.A. Davidson & Co.’s 14th Annual Engineering & Construction Conference on September 10, 2015 in San Francisco,       California. A live and archived webcast of Mr. Gordon’s presentation       will be available the morning of September 10, 2015 through the investor       relations section of Aegion’s website at www.aegion.com/investors .
About Aegion Corporation
Aegion Corporation is a global leader in infrastructure protection       and maintenance, providing proprietary technologies and services to (i)       protect against the corrosion of industrial pipelines; (ii) rehabilitate       and strengthen water, wastewater, energy and mining piping systems and       buildings, bridges, tunnels and waterfront structures; and (iii) utilize       integrated professional services in engineering, procurement,       construction, maintenance and turnaround services to a broad range of       energy related industries. More information about Aegion can be       found on our internet site at www.aegion.com .
